::: {.callout-tip title="Resources for tutorials" collapse="true"}

The notebooks for the tutorials can be downloaded from this website (click on the Jupyter icon).

The following Julia environments can be used:

- [candice server](https://jupytercloud.idcs.polytechnique.fr/jupyter)
  - choose the ENSAE in the list of schools, then "computational economics"
  - it has Dynare preinstalled
- [mybinder](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/albop/ae2e6_tutorials.git/HEAD)
  - a bit slow to run
- a local Julia installation (your own responsability)

You can browse the dyno models at this [address](https://www.mosphere.fr/ae2e6_models)



:::
